sentences.sContent: Everything was covered in a thick layer of dust.
sentences.sCn: 所有东西上面都蒙着厚厚一层灰。

sentences.sContent: I decided to tell her everything.
sentences.sCn: 我决定把一切都告诉她。

sentences.sContent: Apart from the bus arriving late, everything else seemed to be going according to plan.
sentences.sCn: 除了公共汽车晚点之外，其他一切似乎都在按计划进行。

phrases.pCn: 一切事物；以及其他等等
[口语]具有各种优点(或吸引力、所需之物等)

trans.tranCn: 每件事物；最重要的东西；（有关的）一切；万事
